amendment.description: Amendment provides that citizens who are eligible to vote are not prohibited from participating in the political process solely because they work for U.S. subsidiaries of foreign-owned companies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to protect equal participation of eligible voters in campaigns and elections notwithstanding the voter that lives outside of the United States or is employed by a foreign subsidiary or multinational corporation.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gillmor to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Gillmor amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 395 - 0, 3 Present (Roll No. 251).
